entry.name: blind
entry.title: Blind Effect
entry.desc: The blind effect hides or shows an element by wrapping the element in a container, and "pulling the blinds"

longdesc.p: The container has overflow: hidden applied, so height changes affect what's visible.

dl.dd: Hides the element by pulling a blind in the direction
Shows the element by pulling a blind from the direction. This seems inverted from the hide.
Will use hide or show depending on the current visibility of the element

desc.p: The direction the blind will be pulled to "hide" the element., or the direction from which the element will be revealed.

example.html: Click anywhere to toggle the silver box.
